sys_graphql_resolver.name: AppleCheck

sys_update_version.name: sys_graphql_resolver_30f428b5c3552210e4d6b132b401315e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_graphql_resolver"><sys_graphql_resolver action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>AppleCheck</name><schema display_value="BetriebssystemCheck">3cb4a0b5c3552210e4d6b132b40131fe</schema><script><![CDATA[(function process(env) {
  var userId = gs.getUserID(); // Holt die UserID des aktuellen Benutzers
  var gr = new GlideRecord('alm_hardware');
  gr.addQuery('assigned_to', userId);
  gr.addQuery('model.manufacturer', 'Apple');
  gr.query();
  
  return gr.hasNext(); // Gibt true zur체ck, wenn mindestens ein Apple-Ger채t zugewiesen ist
})(env);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_graphql_resolver</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-04 13:19:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>30f428b5c3552210e4d6b132b401315e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AppleCheck</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DeviceFinder" source="x_1639660_devicefi">b1a177cfc30d2e90e4d6b132b401315c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DeviceFinder">b1a177cfc30d2e90e4d6b132b401315c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_graphql_resolver_30f428b5c3552210e4d6b132b401315e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-04 13:19:44</sys_updated_on></sys_graphql_resolver></record_update>
